name: RegexpUtilsTest
description: Unit tests for the RegexpUtils class, specifically focusing on the escapeRegex method.

test_cases.name: escape_regex_characters
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing a single regex character ($) to ensure it is escaped correctly.

test_cases.name: escape_all_regexp_characters
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing all regex characters to ensure they are all escaped correctly.

test_cases.name: escape_escaped_regexp_characters
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing already escaped regex characters to ensure they are handled correctly.

test_cases.name: do_not_escape_when_there_is_nothing_to_escape
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing no regex characters to ensure it is returned unchanged.

test_cases.name: gives_no_error_for_unicode_characters
test_cases.description: Tests the escapeRegex method with a string containing Unicode characters to ensure they are returned unchanged.
